introData: Motivated developer dedicated to develop and optimizing websites. Hans-on in various technologies, a team player with an eye for every detail and an excellent communicator.
I am currently working as Frontend Developer at NFN Labs, Chennai on ReactJS, Javascript and cross platform app development using Facebook's React Native.

experience.description: I have worked on a bunch of projects here. The main technologies I used here in Projects are ReactJs, Redux, React Native and WebExtensions API.

education.college: PSNA College of Engg. and Tech.
education.description: I completed my under-graduate degree in Bachelor of Technology in the branch Information Technology in PSNA College of Engineering and Technology on 2018. I took this course based on my interest towards the emerging IT sector during this period and I dedicated myself for learning new technologies.

education.college: Mahatma Montessori Matric. Hr. Sec. School
education.description: I did my higher secondary education and secondary schooling here. That was one of the good days in my life where we have learnt many things including Paper Presentation, Seminars, Spot pitching and so on. Here we used to learn things in a more practical manner rather than theoretically.

projects.name: Project IHRM
projects.title: Integrated Human Resource Management
projects.description: This project won the 6th position at Smart India hackathon-2017 under the ministry of steel at Indore, MP. The main moto is to manage the human resources deployed by the contractors and the goverment users can see the whole process in thier portal avoiding forgery.
projects.toolsUsed: C#, .Net, Mobile Application, Raspberry PI, Machine Learning, PHP

projects.name: Fly-By
projects.title: Navigation System for Flying Cars
projects.description: This project is a futuristic approach to navigation system for drones and flying vehicles. The project is in initial stage of development. We are using ArcGIS software for creating a map service server. We are focused to develop a prototype, which depicts the navigation assistance for drones and flying vehicles.

projects.name: Project ISM
projects.title: Integrated Scheme Management
projects.description: This project won the 1st position at Smart India hackathon-2018 under the Ministry of Social Empowerment and Justice at Bhopal, MP. The main moto is to map all the schemes of the central government and all the state governments into a single portal avoiding the duplicacy and creating more awareness by scaning the Aadhar Card.
projects.toolsUsed: AngularJS, Mobile Application, HTML, CSS, Firebase
